meanings.definition: A style of handwriting characterized by flowing, rounded letters.
meanings.sent1: In school, we practiced writing in copperplate to improve our penmanship.
meanings.sent2: The wedding invitations were beautifully written in copperplate.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a note in copperplate handwriting that led to solving the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her copperplate script danced across the page like elegant calligraphy.
meanings.sent5: The artist's copperplate writing was so neat and precise, it looked like a printed font.

meanings.definition: A type of printing plate made of copper.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed an ancient copperplate used for printing books.
meanings.sent2: The copperplate was carefully etched to create detailed images for the book illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the copperplate, leaving ink prints all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The copperplate gleamed under the light, showcasing intricate designs engraved on its surface.
meanings.sent5: The copperplate was a crucial tool in the printing process, ensuring high-quality reproductions.

meanings.definition: A type of engraving or printing done on copper plates.
meanings.sent1: The artist specialized in creating copperplate prints of landscapes.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a collection of valuable copperplate engravings from the 18th century.
meanings.sent3: The copperplate printing process required great skill and attention to detail.
meanings.sent4: The copperplate engravings depicted scenes from ancient mythology with stunning accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The intricate copperplate designs added a touch of elegance to the art exhibition.
